Text:
Can someone explain

I have a 7,2 ratio on this torrent but when i stop UL and start DL on another comp all i get is 1 seed. Is season 02 not welcome.? I've got up to season 10 waiting here and won't continue with the seasons untill i see more seeds

@djevojka its okay dude, when i download a keygen, i get the same results. This is how you fix it: 1.download the same file on both pcs. 2. wait til the downloads for both are done. 3.delete the files off the other pc. thats how I solve my problems w/torrents. hope it helped. =)
